info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 36846
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 36846
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	20 mx2.alwaysdata.com.
envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	10 mx1.alwaysdata.com.

extracted-results: "v=DMARC1; p=quarantine; sp=reject; rua=mailto:dmarc@thibault.miximum.fr!10m; ruf=mailto:dmarc@thibault.miximum.fr!10m; rf=afrf; pct=100; ri=86400"
request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 51663
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 51663
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
_dmarc.envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=DMARC1; p=quarantine; sp=reject; rua=mailto:dmarc@thibault.miximum.fr!10m; ruf=mailto:dmarc@thibault.miximum.fr!10m; rf=afrf; pct=100; ri=86400"

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 6429
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 6429
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns1.alwaysdata.com.
envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns2.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 49421
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 49421
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 3, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=oLxIvDBJWiRUJgw5wN49EbfZJB77sC_77K34WLlubpw"
envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.alwaysdata.com ?all"
envergo.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"brevo-code:851b893af58ab3afeafc9057aae6bfd2"

info.name: HttpOnly Cookie - Detect
author: mr. bobo hp
info.description: Checks whether cookies in the HTTP response contain the HttpOnly attribute. If the HttpOnly flag is set, it means that the cookie is HTTP-only

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: envergo.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 302 Found
Connection: close
Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8
Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin
Date: Sun, 29 Oct 2023 04:04:36 GMT
Location: /simulateur/
Referrer-Policy: same-origin
Set-Cookie: visitorid=14390e12-f77d-491b-a33a-79ffe5fc47cb; expires=Fri, 22 Nov 2024 04:04:36 GMT; HttpOnly; Max-Age=33696000; Path=/; SameSite=Lax; Secure
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=60; includeSubDomains; preload
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: DENY
X-Request-Id: 9ea153ff-a3f9-42c7-b972-1550ee22e5ba
Content-Length: 0

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: envergo.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Date: Sun, 29 Oct 2023 04:05:59 GMT Referrer-Policy: same-origin Set-Cookie: visitorid=1f1da6b0-870e-4194-b87b-34ae856050cc; expires=Fri, 22 Nov 2024 04:05:59 GMT; HttpOnly; Max-Age=33696000; Path=/; SameSite=Lax; Secure Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=60; includeSubDomains; preload X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Request-Id: 942c6b1f-fb4a-4e25-baee-2d6bfe641757 403 Forbidden

Interdit (403)

La v√©rification CSRF a √©chou√©. La requ√™te a √©t√© interrompue.

Vous voyez ce message parce que ce site HTTPS exige que le navigateur web envoie un en-t√™te ¬´¬†Referer¬†¬ª, ce qu‚Äôil n'a pas fait. Cet en-t√™te est exig√© pour des raisons de s√©curit√©, afin de s‚Äôassurer que le navigateur n‚Äôait pas √©t√© pirat√© par un intervenant externe.

Si vous avez d√©sactiv√© l‚Äôenvoi des en-t√™tes ¬´¬†Referer¬†¬ª par votre navigateur, veuillez les r√©activer, au moins pour ce site ou pour les connexions HTTPS, ou encore pour les requ√™tes de m√™me origine (¬´¬†same-origin¬†¬ª).

Si vous utilisez la balise <meta name="referrer" content="no-referrer"> ou que vous incluez l‚Äôen-t√™te ¬´ Referrer-Policy: no-referrer ¬ª, il est pr√©f√©rable de les enlever. La protection CSRF exige que l‚Äôen-t√™te ``Referer`` effectue un contr√¥le de r√©f√©rant strict. Si vous vous souciez de la confidentialit√©, utilisez des alternatives comme <a rel="noreferrer" ‚Ä¶> pour les liens vers des sites tiers.

Des informations plus d√©taill√©es sont affich√©es lorsque la variable DEBUG vaut True.
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: envergo.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://envergo.beta.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
